Inrupt Client Libraries

  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
com.inrupt.client.auth

  • Packages that use com.inrupt.client.auth 
    Package Description
    com.inrupt.client
    Application interfaces for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.auth
    Authentication and Authorization classes for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.core
    Core classes and utilities for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.openid
    OpenID support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.solid
    Support for Solid specific concepts for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.spi
    Service interfaces for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
    com.inrupt.client.uma
    User Managed Access support for the Inrupt Client Libraries.
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client.auth used by com.inrupt.client 
    Class Description
    Challenge
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    Session
    An interface for working with session objects.
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client.auth used by com.inrupt.client.auth 
    Class Description
    Challenge
    Part of the HTTP Challenge and Response authentication framework, this class represents a challenge object as represented in a WWW-Authenticate Response Header.
    Credential
    A credential that can be used with Solid resource servers.
    DPoP
    An abstraction for working with OAuth 2.0 Demonstrating Proof-of-Possession at the Application Layer (DPoP).
    Session
    An interface for working with session objects.
  • Classes in com.inrupt.client.auth used by com.inrupt.client.core
